chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> length ln = length l

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive height_pred : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := height_pred_nil : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), height_pred n [n] [t] t | height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments height_pred _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments height_pred_nil _%nat_scope Arguments height_pred_node _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
height_pred_not_nil1 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ln <> []
height_pred_not_nil2 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> l <> []
height_pred_ordered_cover : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ordered_cover l t
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
length_encode_nId : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (n : nat), length (encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) (id_list a n)) = n * length l1
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop]
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
all_cover_aux_cover : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n) -> cover l t
cover_all_cover_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> cover l t -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n)
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
frequency_length : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), unique_key c -> length (encode eqA_dec c m) = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : A * list bool) => a + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec (fst b) m * length (snd b)) c 0
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
[] : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
height_pred_sind : forall P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n [n] [t] t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_ind : forall P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n [n] [t] t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
cover_inv_leaf_aux : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = [leaf a]
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
